name: John Doe
title: Engineer
about: A decent software engineer, with a degree in electrical engineering, who dabbles in hardware and electronics.

positions.title: Engineer
positions.blurb: Full-time engineer, working on both software and electrical components.
bulletPoints: Developed a motion activated electronic control using a time of flight sensor to replace push buttons for crosswalks at intersections.
Produced an electronic widget that detects nearby lightning strikes. Reports the distance of the strike to the user via a set of multi-colored LEDs, with each LED representing the distance.

positions.title: Intern
positions.blurb: Worked part-time while finishing my degree.
bulletPoints: Wrote code in C/C++ for electronic controllers.
Learned how to use a soldering iron.

positions.title: Cashier
positions.blurb: Worked part-time as a cashier while pursuing my bachelor's degree.
bulletPoints: Rapidly checked out customers using PoS system.
Effectively managed customer inquiries and provided customer service when necessary.

otherPursuits.blurb: I always enjoyed cars and becoming a race car driver has been a dream of mine for a while now. On the weekends, I practice racing skills on the track. Hoping someday I can become a professional driver.
Have been shredding the pow since I was 7 years old. Every winter I improve my skills.
